name: v0.5.0
body:
## Using [Bzlmod] with Bazel 6:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_py", version = "0.5.0")
```

And also register a Python toolchain, see rules_python. For example:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_python", dev_dependency = True, version = "0.22.0")

python = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:python.bzl", "python")
python.toolchain(
    name = "python3",
    configure_coverage_tool = True,
    python_version = "3.11",
)
use_repo(python, "python3_toolchains")

register_toolchains(
    "@python3_toolchains//:all",
)
```

[Bzlmod]: https://bazel.build/build/bzlmod

## Using WORKSPACE

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_py",
    sha256 = "e1d1023bc9ba8545dc87c6df10508d9d7c20f489f5e5c5c1e16380b33c013485",
    strip_prefix = "rules_py-0.5.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/releases/download/v0.5.0/rules_py-v0.5.0.tar.gz",
)
# Fetches the rules_py dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@aspect_rules_py//py:repositories.bzl", "rules_py_dependencies")
rules_py_dependencies()
```


## What's Changed
* refactor: put 'git archive' config in .gitattributes by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/215
* feat: support 'virtual' dependencies by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/201
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_gazelle to v0.34.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/188
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_python_gazelle_plugin to v0.26.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/192
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v1.38.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/187
* fix(py_library): don't return transitive srcs as defaultinfo by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/221
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.42.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/195
* build(deps): bump django from 4.2.0 to 4.2.7 in /py/tests/virtual/django by @dependabot in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/220
* build(deps): bump django from 4.2.5 to 4.2.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/216
* fix: use original interpreter path as 'home' value in pyvenv.cfg by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/226

## New Contributors
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/220

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/compare/v0.4.0...v0.5.0

name: v0.4.0
body:
## Using [Bzlmod] with Bazel 6:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_py", version = "0.4.0")
```

And also register a Python toolchain, see rules_python. For example:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_python", dev_dependency = True, version = "0.22.0")

python = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:python.bzl", "python")
python.toolchain(
    name = "python3_9",
    configure_coverage_tool = True,
    python_version = "3.9",
)
use_repo(python, "python3_9_toolchains")

register_toolchains(
    "@python3_9_toolchains//:all",
)
```

[Bzlmod]: https://bazel.build/build/bzlmod

## Using WORKSPACE

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_py",
    sha256 = "50b4b43491cdfc13238c29cb159b7ccacf0a1e54bd27b65ff2d5fac69af4d46f",
    strip_prefix = "rules_py-0.4.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/releases/download/v0.4.0/rules_py-v0.4.0.tar.gz",
)
# Fetches the rules_py dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@aspect_rules_py//py:repositories.bzl", "rules_py_dependencies")
rules_py_dependencies()
```


## What's Changed
* chore(deps): update io_bazel_rules_docker digest to 8e70c6b by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/148
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_gazelle to v0.32.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/156
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v1.33.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/144
* chore: update .gitignore by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/166
* chore(deps): update aspect_gcc_toolchain digest to 4bd1f94 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/145
* chore: bump Python dependencies by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/167
* Allow passing deps in py_pytest_main by @linzhp in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/163
* fix: ensure coverage providers are output from both py_library and py_binary rules by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/168
* chore: update sqlparse by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/169
* chore: bump bazel version to 6.3.1 by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/170
* chore(deps): update aspect_gcc_toolchain digest to 70a8c93 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/171
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v6.3.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/177
* fix: use rlocation for interpreter location by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/182
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_python to v0.18.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/134
* chore: update Python dependencies by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/183
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_skylib to v1.4.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/135
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.41.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/178
* feat: expose py_venv rule, allowing creation of virtual envs from multiple targets by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/181
* chore: skip examples in release artifact by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/185
* Update readme by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/186
* Add `testonly` and `data` parameters to `py_pytest_main` rule by @kpark-hrp in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/190
* chore: run pre-commit on all files by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/199
* docs: update README by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/197
* chore: update rules_python by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/200
* chore: dogfood our rules rather than rules_python by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/204
* docs: improve generated documentation by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/203
* chore: use modern helper from bazel-lib by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/207

## New Contributors
* @linzhp made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/163
* @kpark-hrp made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/190

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/compare/v0.3.0...v0.4.0

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:


And also register a Python toolchain, see rules_python. For example:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_python", dev_dependency = True, version = "0.22.0")
```

## What's Changed

* chore(deps): update dependency iniconfig to v2 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/123

* chore(deps): update io_bazel_rules_docker digest to fc729d8 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/132
* chore(deps): update dependency django to v4.0.9 [security] by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/139
* chore: update renovate config by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/146

## New Contributors
* @mvukov made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/112

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/compare/v0.1.0...v0.2.0

name: v0.1.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_py",
    sha256 = "66da30b09cf47ee40f2ae1c46346cc9a412940965d04899bd68d06a9d3380085",
    strip_prefix = "rules_py-0.1.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/archive/refs/tags/v0.1.0.tar.gz",
)

# Fetches the rules_py dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@aspect_rules_py//py:repositories.bzl", "rules_py_dependencies")
rules_py_dependencies()

```


## What's Changed
* feat: py_* rules in Starlark by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/10
* fix: ensure transitive wheels are passed from py_library by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/11
* feat: create venv in a separate action by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/12
* fix: don't pass kwargs to py_venv rule by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/16
* fix: ensure all Python toolchain files are added to runfiles by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/20
* fix: ensure VIRTUAL_ENV var is set correctly, unset PYTHONHOME if set by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/23
* fix: check for setuptools before creating symlinks by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/24
* feat: support interpreter_path from py3_toolchain by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/22
* fix: remove check on missing interpreter or interpreter_path on the toolchain by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/27
* feat: add autodetecting toolchain compatible with rules_py venvs by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/26
* fix: don't treat all transitive py_library rules as external by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/29
* chore: tidy and add django example by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/28
* test: import from external non-wheel py_library by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/30
* fix: typo autodecting -> autodetecting by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/34
* fix: workspace import pathing on py_library by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/32
* chore: bump bazel version to 5.1.1 by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/35
* fix: don't add source files to requirements files from transitive native py_library rules by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/36
* chore: rename BUILD to BUILD.bazel by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/38
* chore: show errors by default for failed tests by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/41
* chore: update rules_python to 0.8.1 by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/42
* chore: simplify default import attrs on macros by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/40
* fix: symlink to python3 instead of python_real by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/37
* chore: update aspect_bazel_lib to 0.12.1 by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/44
* fix: don't set sibling directory for venvs output directory by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/45
* fix: add the runfiles root as a python package by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/39
* feat: add support for variable and location expansion on `env` attr by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/47
* chore: add configuration for the Aspect gcc toolchain by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/43
* feat: return PyInfo provider from py_binary rules by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/48
* chore: update aspect_bazel_lib to 1.0.0 by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/49
* tests: adds first party dependencies to the container test, add note about usage by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/54
* Configure Renovate by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/50
* chore(deps): update actions/checkout action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/59
* chore(deps): update actions/cache action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/58
* chore(deps): update dependency asgiref to v3.5.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/55
* refactor: remove use of maybe() helper by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_py/pull/60
